name: noogie
actor_no_arg: You make a head locking motion and shake your fist at it -- the universal sign of the noogie.
others_no_arg: $n looks around for someone to noogie.
actor_found_target: You grab $N, get $M in a head lock and NOOGIE $M!
others_found: $n grabs $N in a head lock and NOOGIES $M... ARGH!!!
target_found: Oh NO, $n grabs you, throws you in a head lock and NOOGIES you!
actor_auto: That person has gone off to other lands...
others_auto: $n rubs $s OWN head and creates a static charge... *ZAP*
